name: Potato Boom
description:
EASY TO PLAY

HARD TO MASTER

This is an early version that lets you have a little fun on the collection lane! Here, your goal is to collect as many coins and rare items as possible.

Are you able to find the famous green coin?

Thanks for taking an interest in testing Potato Boom!

Your feedback is important to us.

Coming soon, puzzle maps and new game modes will be available, stay tuned!

Potato Boom is a physics-based, item-gathering casual game with simple and fun mechanics!

Multiple Game Modes are available and every month new amazing levels are released in puzzle mode.
